metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5274 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the view operations page inphpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.3 and 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 allows remoteauthenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a craftedview name, related to js/functions.js.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
